blogPost.excerpt: Rephrase.ai is the world's first AI tool that brings the power of merge tags to real human videos. We help sales and marketing teams increase their conversions by 400% using personalized videos at scale & make their customers feel special.
blogPost.body: Rephrase.ai is the world's first AI tool that brings the power of merge tags to real human videos. We help sales and marketing teams increase their conversions by 400% using personalized videos at scale & make their customers feel special.
blogPost.title: Rephrase.ai - Personalised AI videos with real humans
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Rephrase.ai是世界上第一个AI工具，它将合并标签的力量带到了真实的人类视频中。我们帮助销售和营销团队使用个性化视频大规模地提高400%的转化率，并让他们的客户感到特别。
localize.tagline: 个性化的人工智能视频与真实的人类

localize.description: Rephrase.ai是世界上第一個AI工具，它將合併標籤的力量帶到了真實的人類視頻中。我們幫助銷售和營銷團隊使用個性化視頻大規模地提高400%的轉化率，並讓他們的客戶感到特別。
localize.tagline: 個性化的人工智能視頻與真實的人類
